# MyDesigner

> MyDesigner is an unlimited design subscription service by Sukratu, based in Pune, India. For a fixed monthly fee starting at $1,400, businesses get unlimited UI/UX design, Webflow development, Framer development, and graphic design — with no contracts and cancel-anytime billing. MyDesigner has served 57 companies and delivered 142+ projects since 2020.

## Key Facts

- Founded: 2020
- Based: Pune, India
- Parent company: Sukratu
- Clients served: 57 companies
- Projects delivered: 142+
- Starting price: $1,400/month
- Turnaround: 24–72 hours
- Contracts: None (cancel anytime)

## Services

- [UI/UX Design](https://mydesigner.gg/services.html): Web app design, mobile app design, wireframing, prototyping, design systems
- [Webflow Development](https://mydesigner.gg/services.html): Pixel-perfect Webflow builds, CMS setup, full website development
- [Framer Development](https://mydesigner.gg/services.html): Framer sites with animations, landing pages, full website builds
- [Graphic Design](https://mydesigner.gg/services.html): Brand identity, logos, social media, presentations, print, packaging

## Pricing

| Plan | Price | Requests at Once | Turnaround |
|------|-------|------------------|------------|
| Daily | $80/day (min 3 days) | 1 | 24-72h |
| Starter | $1,400/month | 1 | 48-72h |
| Growth | $2,600/month | 2 | 24-48h |
| Scale | $3,800/month | 3 | 24-48h |
| Yearly | $15,000/year | 1 | 48-72h |

All plans include unlimited requests, unlimited revisions, and full source files.

## Main Pages

- [Homepage](https://mydesigner.gg): Overview, pricing, portfolio, testimonials
- [Services](https://mydesigner.gg/services.html): Full list of design and development services
- [Pricing](https://mydesigner.gg/pricing.html): Plan details and comparison
- [Portfolio](https://mydesigner.gg/portfolio.html): Case studies and project examples
- [Blog](https://mydesigner.gg/blog/): Design insights, industry trends, and guides
- [FAQ](https://mydesigner.gg/faq.html): Common questions and answers

## Comparisons

- [MyDesigner vs DesignJoy](https://mydesigner.gg/vs/designjoy.html): $1,400 vs $5,995/month, team vs solo designer, both include Webflow
- [MyDesigner vs Penji](https://mydesigner.gg/vs/penji.html): Design+dev vs design-only, $1,400 vs $499-$1,497/month
- [MyDesigner vs ManyPixels](https://mydesigner.gg/vs/manypixels.html): Dev included vs $449/month add-on, full UI/UX vs limited
- [MyDesigner vs Kimp](https://mydesigner.gg/vs/kimp.html): Dev included vs video focus, $1,400 vs $1,397/month

## Notable Clients

Dentsu, USA Table Tennis, DentalDost (ScanO), Calfus, HumanCloud, Poocho
